reviews.text: We were very pleased with our stay at Cross Creek Cottages and would definitely visit again.
reviews.title: Rustic Rural Charm

likes.liked: — Peaceful rural setting and funky charm
likes.disliked: — Not a thing - it was excellent

reviews.title: Great place to stay
reviews.text: The Cottages are north of Patagonia and located on a working farm - if you're expecting resort level manicured grounds look elsewhere. If you want a quiet rural experience in a very funky cottage read on!
